text:
Go to permalink GIF 
Being excited for a new season of Top Gear is very much like being excited for the holidays: you know great stuff is coming your way, you just aren’t quite certain of what it might be. This new Top Gear trailer makes me feel exactly that way. Top Gear Returns March 13th Without That Silly Star In A Rallycross Car Segment Top Gear Returns March 13th Without That Silly Star In A Rallycross Car Segment Top Gear Returns March 13th Without That Silly… Top Gear returns next month, rejuvenated again, again, and there’s more good news—that silly ‘Star… Read more Read more 
Mark your calendars, friends, because the BBC announced a new Top Gear on BBC America release date today. It’s not March 13, like we previously reported, but on Sunday, March 12 at 8 p.m. EST. Extra Gear will follow. Got that? Advertisement Advertisement 
While the show will be primarily led by Matt LeBlanc, Chris Harris and Rory Reid, you can also look forward to appearances from Sabine Schmitz, Eddie Jordan and The Stig. Sigh a breath of relief because the “Star in a Rallycross Car” segment is gone . 
The seven-part show will take you to places like Cuba, Kazakhstan, Monaco and the American West. You’ll see top-shelf cars like the Ford GT, Aston Martin DB11, Ferrari FXX K and Bugatti Chiron. 
Take a look at the trailer and get excited because I sure am. Tip Top Gear
